description: Students focus intensively on the dance forms and styles of selected cultures chosen by the instructor in consultation with the students. Ticket/transportation fee required. May be repeated. P/N only. Offered periodically. Prerequisite: DANCE 108 or DANCE 109 or DANCE 124 or permission of instructor.
name: Intl Dance II
notes: Students that do not meet the prerequisites, but have previous dance experience,
can register for this offering of Dance 209.
prerequisites: DANCE 108 or DANCE 109 or DANCE 124 or permission of instructor.
title: International Dance II: Selected Dance Cultures
